title: Couch Surf
desc: A dashboard app meant to kick off your web browsing with a liitle bit of everything. I designed the games section here and also created the game, Couch Blasters: Pandemic.

title: Dev Fit
desc: A gym login application, designed to control access to members, employees, and managers. Class schedules are added upon login along with high level functionality.

title: React Employee Directory
desc: Simple application for consuming API, and filtering for names built in React.

title: Weather Dashboard
desc: Weather forcast app that is simple and straight forward. Just type a city and it will give you the forecast for that area.
